description: Task 2.5 complete: Cross-language variant hints. Detects naming variants across languages (user_service in Python ↔ UserService in TypeScript). Generates all conventions (snake/camel/Pascal/kebab), queries DB for symbols in other languages. Fields: has_variants, variants_count, languages. All 56 tests passing (20 Phase 1 + 36 Phase 2). symbols.py at 84% coverage. Perfect for polyglot code navigation.
